name: URL to Screenshot
description:
Insert a URL and get a screenshot back right inside Figma. You can also specify a device to emulate. If you want the screenshot of the entire webpage, that's possible too.

Under the hood, the plugin uses an API built on Puppeteer.

If the resulting screenshot is more than 4096px in height, Figma might pixelate it due to performance limitations. 

If you have any feedback, direct them to: twitter.com/kns008
